FAQ.QUESTION: I have issues regarding order
FAQ.ANS: Write us at care@foodie.com quoting order id

FAQ.QUESTION: Food quality is bad
FAQ.ANS: File a complaint by calling 1800232328 or email us

FAQ.QUESTION: Can we pay online?
FAQ.ANS: We are working on it right now and add it in a few days

FAQ.QUESTION: How to cancel the order?
FAQ.ANS: No, you can't cancel the order
